아티스트 디스코그래피 상세 조회

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"} children={"Request"}></Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[
    { in: "path", name: "artist_id", schema: { type: "string" }, required: true },
    {
      name: "cursor",
      required: false,
      in: "query",
      description: "The pagination cursor value.",
      schema: { type: "string" },
    },
    {
      in: "query",
      name: "kind",
      schema: {
        type: "string",
        "x-spec-enum-id": "451e9e7ea9bd467a",
        title: "유형",
        "x-enumNames": ["참여작품", "음원", "영상"],
        enum: ["ALBUM", "AUDIO", "VIDEO"],
      },
      description: "* `AUDIO` - 음원\n* `VIDEO` - 영상\n* `ALBUM` - 참여작품",
    },
    {
      name: "page_size",
      required: false,
      in: "query",
      description: "Number of results to return per page.",
      schema: { type: "integer" },
    },
  ]}></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={"Body"} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    "200": {
      content: {
        "application/json": {
          schema: {
            type: "object",
            properties: {
              cursor: { type: "string", nullable: true },
              results: {
                type: "array",
                items: {
                  type: "object",
                  properties: {
                    id: { type: "integer", readOnly: true },
                    kind: {
                      enum: ["ALBUM", "AUDIO", "VIDEO"],
                      type: "string",
                      description: "* `AUDIO` - 음원\n* `VIDEO` - 영상\n* `ALBUM` - 참여작품",
                      "x-spec-enum-id": "451e9e7ea9bd467a",
                      title: "유형",
                      "x-enumNames": ["참여작품", "음원", "영상"],
                    },
                    link: { type: "string", title: "링크", maxLength: 500 },
                    description: { type: "string", nullable: true, title: "코멘트", maxLength: 1000 },
                    instrumentsSet: {
                      type: "array",
                      items: {
                        type: "object",
                        properties: {
                          id: { type: "integer", readOnly: true },
                          nameEn: { type: "string", title: "영어 이름", maxLength: 30 },
                          nameKr: { type: "string", title: "한글 이름", maxLength: 30 },
                        },
                        required: ["id", "nameEn", "nameKr"],
                        title: "DiscographyInstruments",
                      },
                    },
                  },
                  required: ["id", "instrumentsSet", "kind", "link"],
                  title: "Discography",
                },
              },
            },
            title: "PaginatedDiscographyList",
          },
        },
      },
      description: "",
    },
    "401": {
      content: {
        "application/json": {
          schema: {
            type: "object",
            properties: { detail: { type: "string" } },
            required: ["detail"],
            title: "CommonError",
          },
        },
      },
      description: "",
    },
    "403": {
      content: {
        "application/json": {
          schema: {
            type: "object",
            properties: { detail: { type: "string" } },
            required: ["detail"],
            title: "CommonError",
          },
        },
      },
      description: "",
    },
  }}></StatusCodes>
